source_notes: $245B total staked value globally (Dec 2025, Everstake). Coinbase holds 5.1% of ETH staking. Ethereum staking alone ~$112B.
$3.28B in 2025, projected $7.74B by 2032 (360iResearch). Institutional custody $3.2B in 2024 growing at 26.7% CAGR.
Crypto payment gateway market $1.68B in 2025. Crypto credit card market $174B in 2025 (broader definition). Card payment volumes grew from $100M/month to $1.5B/month (2023-2025).
Platform market $10.68B in 2025. Total outstanding loans hit $73.6B record in Q3 2025 (Galaxy). CeFi + DeFi combined.
Stablecoins represent 76% of crypto payment volume. USDC market cap ~$35-40B. Coinbase earns revenue from USDC reserves via Circle partnership.
DeFi TVL ~$54B as of mid-2025. Crypto wallet market projected $187.7B by 2025 (broader definition including all wallet types).
Overall blockchain market $31B in 2024 projected to $390B by 2030. Coinbase operates Base L2 blockchain.
Small but growing. Coinbase Earn already exists. Broader crypto education market emerging. Estimate based on platform spending.
NFT market significantly declined from 2022 peak. Monthly volumes ~$500M-1B in 2025. Market recovering slowly.
Crypto derivatives trading volume far exceeds spot. Market for derivative platform services growing. Coinbase launched futures in 2023.
